not_found_description: We're looking for someone who fits your preferences. Please check back later!
pending_approval_description: We're reviewing your profile for KR-JP matching. Please wait a moment!
like_confirm_description: Sending a like will consume gems.
skip_confirm_description: Skipping will match you with someone new.
skip_error: Failed to skip. Please try again.
accept_error: Failed to accept. Please try again.
reject_error: Failed to reject. Please try again.
rematch_confirm_description: Use gems to find a new KR-JP matching partner.
rematch_no_match: No matching partners available right now. Please try again later.
first_match_confirm_description: Use gems to find a KR-JP friend who matches you.
first_match_cta_hint: Tap the button below to start
onboarding_nudge_text:
Set your preferences and we'll find
someone who's a better fit for you
